text: Pluto doesn’t really support mutating functions like that; instead, you can give the intermediates new names like in <https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/issues/564#issuecomment-708768065|https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/issues/564#issuecomment-708768065> to help the dependency tracking, or just define + mutate the variable all in one cell, and then don’t mutate it later on

to help the dependency tracking, or just define + mutate the variable all in one cell, and then don’t mutate it later on

text: That’s fine, I figured the answer would be something like that.
